consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.whoAmIDesc: Software developer & software architect consultant for turnkey projects. Over 20 years of experience.
consulting.whatDesc: Custom software, systems integration, business process re-engineering, process digitalization, proprietary software design and development, support in selecting/evaluating technology providers. I ensure software infrastructure on the Cloud.
consulting.benefitsDesc: No intermediaries, contracts, or subcontracts typical of modern anonymous consulting services. DIRECT collaboration and interpersonal relationship of mutual trust typical of traditional artisanal services.

steps.1: Process analysis and critical issues identification

ai.title: AI Consulting and New Business Support Tools
